title: John Muir National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park          Â    Looking for more information?    News Here, you can browse through current and archived news releases for our park. Photos and Multimedia Here, you can look through photos and watch videos of our park and related information. History and Culture Learn more about the history of John Muir and his legacy. Education Learn how you can provide education to your classroom about John Muir and this historic site. Kids and Youth See what activities we have for Kids.  Management Information about contacting officials in our park, as well as park policies. Bookstore The John Muir National Historic Site has a book and gift store for all ages.
